mapper.insert: insert into community ( user_id, title, content, reg_dt, read_count ) values ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0 );
mapper.update: update community set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.user_id, u.name as userName, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DT, b.READ_COUNT FROM community b, user u WHERE b.BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND b.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.user_id, u.NAME as userName, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DT, b.READ_COUNT FROM community b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.READ_COUNT DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.user_id, u.NAME as userName, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DT, b.READ_COUNT FROM community b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY b.BOARD_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community WHERE TITLE LIKE concat("%",#{searchWord},"%")

SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.user_id, u.name as userName, u.USER_PROFILE_IMAGE_URL, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.REG_DT, b.READ_COUNT FROM community b, user u WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id AND b.TITLE like concat("%",#{searchWord},"%") ORDER BY b.BOARD_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
